input: The bear is cold. The bear is red. The bear likes the cow. The bear needs the lion. The cow likes the mouse. The cow needs the lion. The cow needs the mouse. The lion is red. The lion is young. The lion needs the cow. The lion sees the bear. The lion sees the cow. The lion sees the mouse. The mouse is cold. If something needs the cow then it likes the lion. If something is young then it likes the cow. If something likes the bear then it sees the lion. If the cow likes the bear and the bear is cold then the cow is kind. If something likes the mouse and it likes the lion then the lion needs the bear. If something needs the lion and the lion likes the cow then it is cold. If something is red then it needs the cow. If something likes the cow and it sees the mouse then the cow is red. If something likes the bear then the bear sees the cow. Question: The lion needs the bear.?
output:
universe u

constant obj : Type u

constant Bear : obj
constant Cow : obj
constant Lion : obj
constant Mouse : obj

constant Cold : obj → Prop
constant Red : obj → Prop
constant Likes : obj → obj → Prop
constant Needs : obj → obj → Prop
constant Young : obj → Prop
constant Sees : obj → obj → Prop
constant Kind : obj → Prop

axiom T1 : Cold Bear
axiom T2 : Red Bear
axiom T3 : Likes Bear Cow
axiom T4 : Needs Bear Lion
axiom T5 : Likes Cow Mouse
axiom T6 : Needs Cow Lion
axiom T7 : Needs Cow Mouse
axiom T8 : Red Lion
axiom T9 : Young Lion
axiom T10 : Needs Lion Cow
axiom T11 : Sees Lion Bear
axiom T12 : Sees Lion Cow
axiom T13 : Sees Lion Mouse
axiom T14 : Cold Mouse

axiom R1 : ∀ x : obj, Needs x Cow → Likes x Lion
axiom R2 : ∀ x : obj, Young x → Likes x Cow
axiom R3 : ∀ x : obj, Likes x Bear → Sees x Lion
axiom R4 : Likes Cow Bear ∧ Cold Bear → Kind Cow
axiom R5 : ∀ x : obj, Likes x Mouse ∧ Likes x Lion → Needs Lion Bear
axiom R6 : ∀ x : obj, Needs x Lion ∧ Likes Lion Cow → Cold x
axiom R7 : ∀ x : obj, Red x → Needs x Cow
axiom R8 : ∀ x : obj, Likes x Cow ∧ Sees x Mouse → Red Cow
axiom R9 : ∀ x : obj, Likes x Bear → Sees Bear Cow

theorem lion_needs_bear : Needs Lion Bear :=
begin
  apply R5 Cow,
  split,
  exact T5,
  apply R1,
  exact T6,
end

-- The answer is True
